attributes.action: Discuss all the points raised in the 'Creative Solutions' campaign. MOTU PROPRIO
attributes.additional_details:
1666 Cestui que vie - NO CONSENT.

Most living beings since 1666 have not had full disclosure enabling them to realise that they are considered to be 'lost at sea' by corporate entities masquerading as civil servants.

We are reclaiming our sovereignty.

We are creating our 'live life claims' & 'sovereign decrees' -  EN MASSE.

2013 MOTU PROPRIO.

We will use - EN MASSE - the Freedom Of Information Act to hold accountable any flesh and blood 'decision maker' who holds back this lawful petition.
attributes.background: We have been tricked. Naughty, naughty Government.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clear the action you would like taken.
